dc:description.en-us: The original model was built on an early draft of glTF 2.0 that did not become final. This new model has been imported and re-exported from Blender to bring it into alignment with the final release glTF 2.0 specification.

dc:rights.en-us: By theblueturtle_(https://sketchfab.com/theblueturtle_), published under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial license.
